definition[0]: a thick tropical forest with many large plants growing very close together
definition[1]: a situation in which it is difficult to become successful or get what you want, especially because a lot of people are competing with each other
definition[2]: something that is very untidy, complicated, or confusing
example[2]: a jungle of freeways and highways
definition[3]: a type of very fast dance music
definition[4]: a situation in which a lot of people or businesses are competing with each other in a very determined way
example[3]: Without the free publicity, the firm would be lost in the jungle of TV advertising.
